data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Guanacaste, Costa Rica that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guanacaste, Costa Rica
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Guanacaste, Costa Rica so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 64,982 believers in Guanacaste, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, move the 64,982 believers in the state of Guanacaste to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, Spanish-speaking people know you.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Guanacaste, Costa Rica.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Guanacaste. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Guanacaste who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Guanacaste
location.cities_list: Liberia, Cañas, Nicoya, Santa Cruz, Tilarán
location.cities_list_w_pop: Liberia (45,380), Cañas (20,306), Nicoya (15,313), Santa Cruz (12,281), Tilarán (7,301)
